description: This file defines a React functional component 'SnippetManager' that handles saving, loading, copying, exporting, and deleting code snippets using React hooks, localStorage, and UI elements. It manages snippets with a specific interface and provides a user interface for snippet management within a JavaScript/TypeScript project.

classes.name: Snippet
classes.description: Interface representing a code snippet with metadata.

classes.name: SnippetManagerProps
classes.description: Props interface for the SnippetManager component.

methods.name: saveSnippetsToStorage
methods.description: Saves the snippets array to localStorage and updates state.

methods.name: handleSaveSnippet
methods.description: Creates a new snippet and saves it to localStorage; updates snippets list.

methods.name: handleLoadSnippet
methods.description: Loads a selected snippet into the editor via callback.

methods.name: handleDeleteSnippet
methods.description: Deletes a snippet after user confirmation.

methods.name: handleExportSnippet
methods.description: Exports snippet code as a downloadable .js file.

methods.name: formatDate
methods.description: Formats ISO date string into a readable date and time string.
